channel.description: Recent content in Kamailio on Mauri870's dev blog

item.title: Telephony and High Availability with Kubernetes
item.description: Kubernetes ingress is designed with layer 7 in mind. Services that needs to expose hundreads of ports and operate at lower levels, like SIP and RTP over UDP struggle to scale in kubernetes out of the box.
